intro.content:
{{electric_blue}}CRIME COMMITTER VI{{/}}

You're a small-time hustler looking to make it big in the criminal underworld.

**Controls:**
Navigate with {{neon_cyan}}arrow keys{{/}} and {{neon_cyan}}number keys{{/}}.
Press {{neon_cyan}}J{{/}} for jobs, {{neon_cyan}}A{{/}} for active runs, {{neon_cyan}}C{{/}} for crew.

**Getting Started:**
Start with simple street crimes to build up cash and cred.
As you progress, you'll unlock new branches and more lucrative operations.
Recruit crew members to handle multiple jobs at once.

**The Game:**
Each crime takes time to complete. Higher risk = higher reward.
Watch your heat level - too much attention brings trouble.
Build street cred to unlock advanced jobs and opportunities.

~~Press any key to begin.~~

first_job_complete.content:
**FIRST JOB COMPLETE**

Nice work. You've completed your first job and earned some cash.

The city has more to offer. Keep grinding street jobs to build your reputation, or explore other branches when they unlock.

{{success_green}}Cash{{/}} lets you invest in better equipment and crew.
{{terminal_green}}Cred{{/}} unlocks access to higher-tier operations.
{{heat_orange}}Heat{{/}} attracts unwanted attention - let it cool down.

commerce_unlocked.content:
**NEW BRANCH: COMMERCE**

You've gained enough reputation to access the {{neon_cyan}}Commerce{{/}} branch.

These operations focus on {{neon_cyan}}theft and burglary{{/}} - riskier than street crimes, but the payouts are worth it.

Breaking into stores and warehouses requires more planning. Some jobs may need specialized crew or tools.

Time to expand your criminal portfolio.
